name: Ordeals of Limbo
description:
Ordeals of Limbo

Dear players:

Windows version is recommended to play the game. 
You need headphone or earphone to play the game. (To hear the sound from different positions.)

This is a Ludum Dare 43 entry. #LDJAM #LD43
Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/ordeals-of-limbo

This is my eleventh time to attend Ludum Dare. Hope that everyone will enjoy my game :) 

This is an action game. You woke up in a place you had never seen with a creature stood right by you. The creature told you that your soul was brought to limbo. It also took you to a place with many skulls and forced you to pass some trials in order to escape from limbo. Your ordeals are just the beginning...

Game Goal:
  • Escape to the exit with your hearing and memory.
Control:
  •  Use **"W", "A", "S", "D"** to move around.
    or
    Use **"↑", "←", "↓", "→"** to move around.
Used tools:  Game Engine
  • Unity
